text: @NYGovCuomo #KillerCuomo Maybe you should've given masks to all the nursing homes you forced to accept COVID19 patients.  Over 5000 elderly might still be alive IF YOU HADN'T SENTENCED THEM TO DEATH.   https://t.co/DgnDsK2vwb
